dcterms:creator: Keshav P. Keval
Vivek S. Borkar
dcterms:description: A multi-agent Markov decision process (MDP) with 2 states and 2 actions, used to demonstrate the performance of the proposed algorithm in a simple case.
dcterms:title: 7-Agent 2-state-2-action MDP (Simple case)

dcterms:creator: Keshav P. Keval
Vivek S. Borkar
dcterms:description: A multi-agent Markov decision process (MDP) with 10 states and 2 actions, used to evaluate the performance of the proposed algorithm in a simple case.
dcterms:title: 7-Agent 10-state-2-action MDP (Simple case)

dcterms:creator: Keshav P. Keval
Vivek S. Borkar
dcterms:description: A multi-agent Markov decision process (MDP) with 2 states and 2 actions, where the per-stage costs depend on the joint actions of all agents, used to demonstrate the performance of the proposed algorithm in a general case.
dcterms:title: 7-Agent 2-state-2-action MDP (General case)

dcterms:creator: Keshav P. Keval
Vivek S. Borkar
dcterms:description: A 4-agent queueing system used to simulate data packet transmission over a common channel, demonstrating the performance of the proposed algorithm in a general case.
dcterms:title: 4-Agent Queueing system (General case)

dcterms:creator: Keshav P. Keval
Vivek S. Borkar
dcterms:description: A 2-agent grid world environment where agents navigate to reach a target, demonstrating the performance of the proposed algorithm in a general case.
dcterms:title: 2-Agent Grid world environment (General case)
